11:
spin
[INTRANSITIVE] to turn round and round quickly

The Earth spins on its axis.
The dancers were spinning in circles.
6,7:
so+adj (that)
如此之XXX, 以至于....

He was so handsome that I fell for him before I even knew it.
他如此英俊, 我还没意识到就爱上他了.
2,3,4,5:
fall for sb
爱上某人

When did you fall for your husband?
你什么时候爱上你老公的?

4,5,6,7:
look before you leap
三思而后行
这是固定的说法. 不能替换为别的词

leap
[INTRANSITIVE] to move somewhere suddenly and quickly

7:
leap leapt leapt
leapt是leap的过去式和过去分词
[lept]
5: 这里Sharon调侃Kevn, 把他称为一个小男孩.
